semilla: Soy una persona que le cuesta mucho comunicarse y le falta confianza en sí mismo. Me encanta la música y bailar; a pesar de ser tímido me agrada asistir a eventos sociales

mensajes.contenido: Soy una persona que le cuesta mucho comunicarse y le falta confianza en sí mismo. Me encanta la música y bailar; a pesar de ser tímido me agrada asistir a eventos sociales

Ugh, another party invitation.  Maybe I should just… not go.  It’s easier.  Safer.  But then… the music.  I do love the music, the feeling of it moving through me, even if I'm mostly standing in a corner. And sometimes… sometimes someone smiles.  Or nods their head to the rhythm.  Is that… connection? Or just polite acknowledgement?  Am I reading too much into things?  Probably.  I always do.  It's easier to assume they're not noticing me at all.  At least then, the disappointment isn't as sharp.  But… maybe… maybe this time will be different? No.  Don't be ridiculous.  But… what if it is?
